Service Details: - Assists people experiencing mental health issues and their families by providing them an opportunity to participate in activities in the community that support their recovery and wellness and improve quality of life- Examples include gym passes, Tai-Chi or Karate classes- Arts and crafts, pottery courses, music lessons- Education, Food Safe Certificate, First Aid Certificate, college courses- Funding for summer camps or swimming lessons
How to Apply: - Download the application form, or pick one up at the front desk- Complete and submit by fax, mail or in person (Note:  applications without invoices may not be eligible for consideration)- You will be contacted by the Wellness Grants Coach once your application has been reviewed and an appointment becomes available
